name: Terminal Limit
description:
Terminal Stream is a very small game that works a LOT like a C64 game I played some time ago. This version is more of a quick and dirty Proof of concept made exclusively for CGA-JAM.

Controls

WASD, Cursor-Keys, Left Stick: Move

Crash "Score Gates" to boost speed. More speed = more score!

Select, ESC or P Pauses the game. You can leave the game from there.

Soundtrack

You can listen to and download the title track on Soundcloud !

Credits

Made with Unity
Graphics, sound and shoddy Programming by me.

Known Issues

The Highscore isn't saved between sessions right now.
